akn:section.akn:heading: National Transportation Security Center of Excellence

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Establishment The Secretary shall establish a National Transportation Security Center of Excellence to conduct research and education activities, and to develop or provide professional security training, including the training of transportation employees and transportation professionals.

(b) Designation The Secretary shall select one of the institutions identified in subsection (c) as the lead institution responsible for coordinating the National Transportation Security Center of Excellence.
(d) Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out this section—
